meanings.sent1: I will untax my savings account to avoid paying extra fees.
meanings.sent2: The government decided to untax essential items to help lower-income families.
meanings.sent3: After a long day of work, I untaxed myself by taking a relaxing bath.
meanings.sent4: She felt like untaxing her mind from worries by going for a peaceful walk in the park.
meanings.sent5: The magician seemed to untax the audience's minds with his mesmerizing tricks.

meanings.sent1: The untaxed income allowed him to save more money for his future.
meanings.sent2: She purchased an untaxed vehicle to avoid additional financial burdens.
meanings.sent3: The untaxed status of the property made it a desirable investment for many buyers.
meanings.sent4: His untaxed status in the country made him feel financially secure.
meanings.sent5: The untaxed goods in the store attracted budget-conscious shoppers looking for savings.
